originContent: # Sky Dolly
translatedContent: # Sky Dolly

originContent: Sky Dolly - The Black Sheep for Your Flight Recordings.
translatedContent: Sky Dolly - 您飞行录制的“黑羊”。

originContent: ## About
translatedContent: ## 关于

originContent: Sky Dolly connects to a running Flight Simulator 2020 instance and records various simulation variables, for replay.
translatedContent: Sky Dolly 连接到正在运行的 Flight Simulator 2020 实例并记录各种模拟变量，以便重放。

originContent: ![Sky Dolly v0.11.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/./img/SkyDolly-v0.11.0.png)
translatedContent: ![Sky Dolly v0.11.0](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/./img/SkyDolly-v0.11.0.png)

originContent: The connection is made via SimConnect, a standard API introduced with Flight Simulator X to connect with the flight simulator.
translatedContent: 连接通过 SimConnect 实现，这是 Flight Simulator X 引入的标准 API，用于连接飞行模拟器。

originContent: Aso refer to the [ABOUT.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/ABOUT.MD).
translatedContent: 另请参阅 [ABOUT.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/ABOUT.MD)。

originContent: ## Features
translatedContent: ## 特性

originContent: - Record / Pause / Play
translatedContent: - 录制 / 暂停 / 播放

originContent: - Formation flights (multiple aircraft, replay during recording, "fly with formation", time offset)
translatedContent: - 编队飞行（多架飞机，录制时重放，“编队飞行”，时间偏移）

originContent: - Settable recording sample rate: fixed or variable ("auto")
translatedContent: - 可设定录制采样率：固定或可变（“自动”）

originContent: - Adjustable replay speed ("slow motion", "timelapse"), replay loop
translatedContent: - 可调节回放速度（“慢动作”，“快进”），回放循环

originContent: - Position, velocity and basic flight control simulation variables (ailerons, rudder, flaps, gears, ...) are recorded
translatedContent: - 记录位置、速度和基本飞行控制模拟变量（副翼、方向舵、副翼、襟翼、起落架等）

originContent: - Plugin architecture with various import/export plugins (CSV, GPX, IGC, KML)
translatedContent: - 插件架构，支持多种导入/导出插件（CSV、GPX、IGC、KML）

originContent: - Location module with over 100 default locations and import/export functionality
translatedContent: - 位置模块，包含100多个默认位置及导入/导出功能

originContent: - Database (SQLite) based persistence ("logbook")
translatedContent: - 基于数据库（SQLite）的持久化（“飞行日志”）

originContent: Watch the (preview) release trailer on [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I):
translatedContent: 观看 [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I) 上的（预览）发布预告片：

originContent: [![Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)](https://img.youtube.com/vi/_n4qRtm78_I/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I "Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (Cinematic Teaser Trailer)")
translatedContent: [![Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (电影预告片)](https://img.youtube.com/vi/_n4qRtm78_I/0.jpg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_n4qRtm78_I "Sky Dolly - Flight Recorder & Replay for Flight Simulator 2020 (电影预告片)")

originContent: For more videos created with Sky Dolly also refer to [SHOWCASE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHOWCASE.md). New and upcoming features are found in the [CHANGELOG](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/CHANGELOG.md).
translatedContent: 更多使用 Sky Dolly 制作的视频请参见 [SHOWCASE](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHOWCASE.md)。新功能和即将推出的功能见 [CHANGELOG](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/CHANGELOG.md)。

originContent: ## Basic Usage
translatedContent: ## 基本使用

originContent: - Start a flight
translatedContent: - 开始飞行

originContent: - Click on "Record" (key R)
translatedContent: - 点击“录制”（快捷键 R）

originContent: - You may pause recording (key P)
translatedContent: - 您可以暂停录制（快捷键 P）

originContent: - Stop recording (key R) and click on "Play" (spacebar)
translatedContent: - 停止录制（按 R 键）并点击“播放”（空格键）

originContent: - Adjust the replay speed and seek the play position, also during replay
translatedContent: - 调整重放速度并在重放期间寻址播放位置

originContent: - Recorded flights are automatically persisted in the "logbook"
translatedContent: - 录制的飞行自动保存在“飞行日志”中

originContent: - Select a flight in the logbook and press "Load" (or double-click the row) to load the persisted flight
translatedContent: - 在飞行日志中选择一条飞行记录，按“加载”（或双击该行）以载入保存的飞行

originContent: ### Formation Recording & Replay
translatedContent: ### 编队录制与重放

originContent: #### Recording
- Switch to the "Formation" module (key F2)
translatedContent: - 切换到“编队”模块（按 F2 键）

originContent: - Click on "Record" (key R)
translatedContent: - 点击“录制”（按 R 键）

originContent: - Each recorded aircraft is added to the current flight
translatedContent: - 每架录制的飞机都会被添加到当前飞行中

originContent: - While existing aircraft are replayed during the recording with "auto" sample rate you may still change the recording sample rate
translatedContent: - 在录制时，已存在的飞机以“自动”采样率重放，您仍可更改录制采样率

originContent: #### Position
- The last recorded aircraft becomes the "user aircraft" (being followed by the camera in the flight simulator)
translatedContent: - 最后录制的飞机成为“用户飞机”（飞行模拟器中摄像机跟随的对象）

originContent: - Select a position relative to the current "user aircraft" before recording
translatedContent: - 在录制前选择相对于当前“用户飞机”的位置

originContent: #### Replay
- Simply click on "Play", "Pause" and seek in the timeline, just like with a single aircraft flight
translatedContent: - 只需点击“播放”、“暂停”并在时间线上寻址，就像单架飞机飞行一样

originContent: - Change the "user aircraft" (also during replay) to "jump from cockpit to cockpit"
translatedContent: - 更改“用户飞机”（即使在重放期间）以实现“从驾驶舱跳转到驾驶舱”

originContent: - Take control of the "user aircraft" by selecting either "Take control" or "Fly with Formation" option
translatedContent: - 通过选择“接管控制”或“与编队飞行”选项来控制“用户飞机”

originContent: #### Managing Formations
translatedContent: #### 管理编队

originContent: - You may delete single aircraft from a flight ("formation")
translatedContent: - 可以从飞行（“编队”）中删除单架飞机

originContent: - There must be at least one aircraft per flight, so the last aircraft cannot be deleted
translatedContent: - 每个飞行至少必须保留一架飞机，因此最后一架飞机无法删除

originContent: - Add a time offset to the selected aircraft ("multiplayer formation flight synchronisation")
translatedContent: - 为选中的飞机添加时间偏移（“多人编队飞行同步”）

originContent: - To start a new, single-aircraft flight change back to the "Logbook" module (key F1) and click on "Record" (key R)
translatedContent: - 若要开始新的单机飞行，请切换回“飞行日志”模块（按 F1 键）并点击“录制”（按 R 键）

originContent: Why don't you try it with one of the guided ["Tell Tours"](https://github.com/till213/Tell-Tours)? :)
translatedContent: 为什么不试试其中一个引导的["Tell Tours"](https://github.com/till213/Tell-Tours)呢？ :)

originContent: ## Download
translatedContent: ## 下载

originContent: Go to [Releases](https://github.com/till213/SkyDolly/releases) and download the latest release.
translatedContent: 前往 [Releases](https://github.com/till213/SkyDolly/releases) 下载最新版本。

originContent: Latest (pre-)release: **Sky Dolly 0.19.2**
translatedContent: 最新（预）版本：**Sky Dolly 0.19.2**

originContent: Compute and compare your checksum against the [published SHA-256 checksums](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHASUM256.md), to verify the integrity of your downloaded copy.
translatedContent: 计算并将您的校验和与[已发布的 SHA-256 校验和](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/SHASUM256.md)进行比较，以验证您下载副本的完整性。

originContent: ## Build
translatedContent: ## 构建

originContent: Refer to the [BUILD](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/BUILD.md) documentation.
translatedContent: 请参阅[BUILD](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/till213/SkyDolly/main/BUILD.md)文档。

originContent: ## Related Projects
translatedContent: ## 相关项目

originContent: - https://github.com/nguyenquyhy/Flight-Recorder - A .Net based flight recording & replay application
translatedContent: - https://github.com/nguyenquyhy/Flight-Recorder - 基于 .Net 的飞行录制与回放应用

originContent: - https://github.com/saltysimulations/saltyreplay/ - A recording & replay with a web user interface
translatedContent: - https://github.com/saltysimulations/saltyreplay/ - 带有网页用户界面的录制与回放

originContent: - https://github.com/SAHorowitz/MSFS2020-PilotPathRecorder - Records the flight and generates Google Earth (KML format) "replays"
translatedContent: - https://github.com/SAHorowitz/MSFS2020-PilotPathRecorder - 记录飞行并生成 Google Earth (KML 格式)“回放”

originContent: - https://github.com/Elephant42/FS_Tool - A simple tool that allows to set the aircraft location and simulation rate
translatedContent: - https://github.com/Elephant42/FS_Tool - 一个简单工具，允许设置飞机位置和仿真速率

originContent: - https://github.com/pyviator/msfs-geoshot - Takes screenshots and automatically "geotags" them
translatedContent: - https://github.com/pyviator/msfs-geoshot - 截图并自动对其进行“地理标记”

originContent: - https://github.com/ijl20/msfs_logger_replay - IGC logger and replay (for FSX)
translatedContent: - https://github.com/ijl20/msfs_logger_replay - IGC 记录器与回放（针对 FSX）

originContent: - https://joinfs.net/ - Allows to synchronise multiplayer flights across different flight simulators (MSFS, Prepar3D/FSX, XPlane). Also provides a flight recorder with formation flight recording ("overdub").
translatedContent: - https://joinfs.net/ - 允许跨不同飞行模拟器（MSFS、Prepar3D/FSX、XPlane）同步多人飞行。还提供带有编队飞行录制（“叠加”）的飞行记录器。

originContent: - https://github.com/paulalexandrow/a32nx-webremote - WebRemote for FlyByWire's A32NX: control cockpit functionality of the FBW A320, using FSUIPC7
translatedContent: - https://github.com/paulalexandrow/a32nx-webremote - FlyByWire 的 A32NX WebRemote：使用 FSUIPC7 控制 FBW A320 的驾驶舱功能

originContent: - https://flightloganalyzer.com/ - FlightLog Analyer analyses the MSFS logbook and has a CSV export readable by Sky Dolly
translatedContent: - https://flightloganalyzer.com/ - FlightLog Analyer 分析 MSFS 日志，并支持导出 Sky Dolly 可读的 CSV

originContent: - https://github.com/BojoteX/FSAutoSave/ - FSAutoSave automatically (or upon request) stores flight plans
translatedContent: - https://github.com/BojoteX/FSAutoSave/ - FSAutoSave 自动（或按需）保存飞行计划

originContent: - https://github.com/mracko/MSFS-Landing-Inspector - Analyses your landing performance
translatedContent: - https://github.com/mracko/MSFS-Landing-Inspector - 分析您的着陆表现

originContent: - [Points of Interest (Google Maps)](https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1KUg5jwyT_9k2A9n5IZ99UChlhfVUfO5S&ll=-3.81666561775622e-14%2C-23.028915134521867&z=1) - Points of Interest, Airports and 3D cities in Microsoft Flight Simulator.
translatedContent: - [兴趣点（Google 地图）](https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?mid=1KUg5jwyT_9k2A9n5IZ99UChlhfVUfO5S&ll=-3.81666561775622e-14%2C-23.028915134521867&z=1) - Microsoft Flight Simulator 中的兴趣点、机场和 3D 城市。

originContent: ## Other Useful Resources
translatedContent: ## 其他有用资源

originContent: - https://obsproject.com/ - Screen capture / broadcast application
translatedContent: - https://obsproject.com/ - 屏幕捕获 / 直播应用

originContent: - https://sqlitebrowser.org/ - Browse the Sky Dolly logbook (*.sdlog) database files, execute your own SQL queries
translatedContent: - https://sqlitebrowser.org/ - 浏览 Sky Dolly 日志 (*.sdlog) 数据库文件，执行自定义 SQL 查询
